fields.description:
I had a discussion lately on FlowDock with Tim Poulson about the {{<fullscreen>}} element in {{tiapp.xml}} and we both came to the conclusion that this element is iOS-only and does exactly the same as setting {{UIStatusBarHidden}} in the {{<ios>}} section.

If this is indeed true then:

- The element should be removed from the [default tiapp.xml|https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/blob/master/support/all/tiapp.xml].
- The [docs|http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/latest/#!/guide/tiapp.xml_and_timodule.xml_Reference-section-29004921_tiapp.xmlandtimodule.xmlReference-fullscreen] should list {{<fullscreen>}} under *Deprecated elements*.
fields.summary: TiAPI: Remove <fullscreen> from default tiapp.xml and deprecate in docs

comments.body: Moving this improvement to engineering for evaluation as Fokke already discussed it with Tim Poulson.
